Hi there, this is my custom terrain for Bedrock. Yet another one bu this time i made a tropical island. The island is very survival friendly, minimal risk of falling and plenty of resources to keep you going! If you simply just want to build or just enjoy the beautiful scenery, just download this amazing custom terrain.
Thank you for downloading and if you have any questions/suggestions then do not hesitate to ask.
Aculos out.

title: Disney?s EPCOT_Center
briefDescription: This is Epcot Center, a custom recreation of the Walt Disney World park from the 1980's by Mickeynerd17 Productions, giving a Minecraft twist to the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is Epcot Center, a custom recreation of the Walt Disney World park from the 1980?s by Mickeynerd17 Productions, giving a Minecraft twist to the Iconic Experimental Prototype Community Of Tomorrow.
Explore the wonders of the future as envisioned in the 1980?s Disney style in this permanent world?s fair. The park is divided into two sections, Future World and World Showcase, with the former being about future technologies and the latter about the unique and diverse cultures of our planet. Step into one of eight pavilions in Future World where you?ll learn about what the future holds in different themes, ranging from communications to transportation, under the sea and in outer space, and into the farthest reaches of imagination, the possibilities are endless! Come and explore today!
This map has been my personal endeavor for almost 3 years. Ever since I discovered the past version of the theme park I love most, Epcot, as it looked in 1989 with all the original pavilions, I have always wanted to build my own version to enjoy and modify. Since starting this project in January 2018, I have slowly shaped a flat Minecraft world into the masterpiece you see today. Each pavilion was handcrafted with precision and care over the course of months to reflect their real-life counterparts, while displaying a Minecraft twist that lives up to a quality experience any guest would expect. Now, I want to share my hard work with the world, so everyone can experience the EPCOT Center of the past, and enjoy the promise of a bright future!
Thanks for checking out my map, and welcome to the 21st century!
Be Sure to follow my social media!
Instagram: Mickeynerd17_Productions
YouTube: Mickeynerd17_Productions

title: Achievement World 1.16
briefDescription: Ever wanted to be able to unlock all the achievements in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition easily? Now you can with this achievement hack world! The map ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Ever wanted to be able to unlock all the achievements in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition easily? Now you can with this achievement hack world! The map features (almost) all the achievements (even the hardest ones). [Updated for 1.14 and 1.16].
With this hacked world, you can obtain (nearly) all the Minecraft achievements! Just install now and play ? the world is already hacked so you don?t have to do anything. At the spawn point you?ll find a chest containing OP gear, and milk (it removes status effects). This map has now been updated to include the 1.14 and 1.16 achievements!
Yes, the update for the 1.14 and 1.16 achievements is now here, along with numerous other fixes which you can read about in the changelog below.

title: Find The Button Extreme Edition
briefDescription: This is an extreme minecraft FIND THE BUTTON! If you are a pro then this one is definitely for you! It has twelve levels and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is an extreme minecraft FIND THE BUTTON! If you are a pro then this one is definitely for you! It has twelve levels and each one gets harder and harder!
This is find the button Minecraft course, it has 12 courses and will test your Minecraft knowledge! Each level has its own twists and has its own biome with different challenges to face. Some of the levels you will have to jump and press the button in mid air! Or maybe climb vines to see the button.
After you find the button, and after you press it, it will teleport you to the next level. If you die you will go back to the start of the map, so be careful when you come over to the nether levels!
To watch the trailer you can click this link and it will take you to the video on YouTube. To show support subscribe and share with your friends, don?t forget to like!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RQ9q1uBokMg
Here?s the link where you can subscribe to my channel, and see all the trailers for all my other addons and maps!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC02OUSvVvxIWcb3-CrSM5Pg/featured?view_as=subscriber

title: The Vault
briefDescription: In this map, you better have a big brain, a large amount of patience, and skill in parkour and mazes, if you want any hope ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In this map, you better have a big brain, a large amount of patience, and skill in parkour and mazes, if you want any hope of getting into The Vault!
The Vault is an escape-type puzzle map in which you must find items and tools that will lead you to other items and tools, etc. ultimately leading you into the Vault! You are a robber, whose goal is to break into the Vault and steal all its valuables! Are you willing to run through mazes and jump through parkour? Are you willing to trade with the villagers and look through hundreds of chests? Can you complete your mission before the police arrive at the scene? Download The Vault now to find out!
If you need help, here is a walkthrough video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SVWJ3Mc0dfQ

title: Bedrock Multi Use Ultimate Super Smelter!
briefDescription: I present to you my ultimate super smelter! You can smelt any item you wish in mass production or mass produce a selection of different ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
I present to you my ultimate super smelter! You can smelt any item you wish in mass production or mass produce a selection of different items. All of these outputs (smelted items) will be categorised and sorted beneath the machine itself. Every item that you can possibly smelt has two huge storage units for itself. A few more units for items such as gold, diamond, redstone, iron etc so the storage unit wont overflow with your most smelted items! All of the storage units are directly accessible from the outside of the machine, for instant access. There is a platform that has the top furnaces input loaders.
These are the barrels, which all you have to do is fill it up, pull the lever and watch the items fly up the tube and into the machine! The bottom furnaces all have the same sort of system, its just built inside the machine itself, almost factory like. Also on the platform is one single button, to add a TON of fuel to the machine and keep it powering on! This can be done manually via the button is mentioned, or can be activated with a lever to make the sweeper go back and fourth at timed intervals! It has 45 loaders for the fuel system, which all have their own light to indicate whether it is unloading fuel into the machine or not. There is also two levers. One for the top furnaces to power them on, and one for the bottom furnaces to power them on. Each floor has 10 furnace systems, altogether 20!
I hope you enjoy this build, and any recommendations/suggestions would be appreciated.
Aculos.

title: Find the Button: Apocalypse Edition
briefDescription: Welcome to my second Find the Button map. Last time, I made a Find the Button map where you only have half heart to beat ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to my second Find the Button map. Last time, I made a Find the Button map where you only have half heart to beat it. And now, I made another one, but each level is infested with zombies! That means you have to fight off zombies while finding the button!
How to play? It?s simple. You have to find the button while being chased by zombies. Before you start, you will receive a diamond and an emerald. Use those to buy equipments before starting the game. You can buy weapons, armor, and even special foods with different perks!
Special Foods:
? Toughness Cookie (Decreases taken damage by 40% for a short amount of time)
? Adrenaline Donut (Increases movement speed by 20% for a short amount of time)
? Healthy Burger (Receives instant health upon eating)
Here?s some screenshots of the map:

There is one island for every tree type in the game and one ore island that is covered in fire and lava but if you can get past it there is lots of riches.
